name: @nathanpb/kext
description: Kotlin inspired extension library for declarative programming with NodeJS
author: Nathan P. Bombana <nathan.pbombana@gmail.com>

scripts.docs: typedoc --entryPoints src/index.ts --out docs/api && cp README.md docs
scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cp package.json dist && cp README.md dist && cp LICENSE dist
scripts.dev: mkdir -p node_modules/@nathanpb && rm -rf node_modules/@nathanpb/kext && ln -s "$PWD/src" node_modules/@nathanpb/kext
